entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
